text: The harder you work, the luckier you get
author: Thomas Jefferson

text: Without changing direction, you stay in the same place
author: Laozi

text: History is the best teacher with the worst students
author: Indira Gandhi

text: Do you have any enemies? Good. So you've stood up for something in your life
author: Winston Churchill

text: Today's expert at something was once a beginner
author: Helen Hayes

text: Don't worry if something doesn't work. If everything worked, you'd be fired
author: Folk Wisdom

text: Always code as if it's going to be accompanied by a violent psychopath who knows where you live
author: Martin Golding

text: Does it work? Don't touch it!
author: Any programmer

text: To understand recursion, you must first understand recursion
author: Any programmer
